name: Oasis Hero Saaddon
description:
a little game I made for Mini Jam 53: Oasis hope you like it

Q/ why when I jump the character's arm stuck on air ?

Because it's Saaddon superhero power and ofc it's not a bug  at all.

Don't ask me what is happening in the game or why there is an Uromastyx because even I don't know why

anyway I hope you will like the game!!
